participant_1.background:
I lost my job but I am grateful for the support of my friends and family.
I've been with myself for the longest time, and it's been a bumpy ride.
i have two border collies.
I have never been arrested, and I am proud of my clean record.
I watch Game of Thrones even though my parents don't approve of it.

participant_2.background:
I once got a paper cut on my finger while delivering a shipment to a university.
I went to Japan and spent my days trying new foods and exploring the city.
my last name is spanish , but i tell people that its italian.
I would chew my food slowly as a kid and my dad would always tell me to hurry up.
I am still haunted by the events of that day, but I am trying to move on with my life.

content.text: Hello! I'm glad to be chatting with you today.
Hey there! Same here! I'm looking forward to a good conversation.
I hope so too! What are some things you like to do for fun?
I love to travel and try new foods. I also enjoy reading and spending time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I've always wanted to travel to Japan.
Japan is amazing! I went there a few years ago and had a great time. I highly recommend it.
What was your favorite part about Japan?
I loved the food and the culture. The people were so friendly and welcoming.
That sounds amazing! I've heard that the food in Japan is really good.
It is! I highly recommend trying sushi and ramen.
I've never had ramen before, but I'm sure I'll like it.
You definitely should! It's one of my favorite foods.
You should definitely go to Japan! It's a great place to visit.
I'll definitely put it on my list of places to visit!
